nodes.text: Barracks D5 was a barracks in Timira City on the planet Kamino. The barracks was built by the Galactic Empire's military. In 1 BBY, Starkiller, the clone of Sith Lord Darth Vader's late Sith apprentice, Galen Marek, escaped the city.
During the escape, a stormtrooper reported that Starkiller was near Barracks D5 when Imperial forces were trying to stop the clone.

Barracks D5 was first mentioned in the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010. The stormtrooper who reports Starkiller's presence varies each time the game is played, and may or may not mention Barracks D5 every time.
